subject: Soccer
UEFA European Football Championship
lead_paragraph: After Giorgos Karagounis’s goal just before halftime, Greece hung on to defeat Russia and reach the quarterfinals of the European soccer championships despite being outshot, 25-5.
snippet: After Giorgos Karagounis’s goal just before halftime, Greece hung on to defeat Russia and reach the quarterfinals of the European soccer championships despite being outshot, 25-5.
